Class SalesItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • SalesItem

  • public class SalesItem
extends java.lang.Object
    The class represents sales items on an online e-commerce site (such as Amazon.com). SalesItem objects store all information relevant to this item, including description, price, customer comments, etc. NOTE: The current version is incomplete! Currently, only code dealing with customer comments is here.
    Version:
    0.1 (2011-07-31)
    Author:
    Michael KÃ¶lling and David J. Barnes

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Return the name of this item.

      • getPrice

        public int getPrice()
        Return the price of this item.

      • getNumberOfComments

        public int getNumberOfComments()
        Return the number of customer comments for this item.

      • addComment

        public boolean addComment(java.lang.String author,
                          java.lang.String text,
                          int rating)
        Add a comment to the comment list of this sales item. Return true if successful; false if the comment was rejected. The comment will be rejected if the same author has already left a comment, or if the rating is invalid. Valid ratings are numbers between 1 and 5 (inclusive).

      • removeComment

        public void removeComment(int index)
        Remove the comment stored at the index given. If the index is invalid, do nothing.

      • upvoteComment

        public void upvoteComment(int index)
        Upvote the comment at 'index'. That is: count this comment as more helpful. If the index is invalid, do nothing.

      • downvoteComment

        public void downvoteComment(int index)
        Downvote the comment at 'index'. That is: count this comment as less helpful. If the index is invalid, do nothing.

      • showInfo

        public void showInfo()
        Show all comments on screen. (Currently, for testing purposes: print to the terminal. Modify later for web display.)

      • findMostHelpfulComment

        public Comment findMostHelpfulComment()
        Return the most helpful comment. The most useful comment is the one with the highest vote balance. If there are multiple comments with equal highest balance, return any one of them.
